name: Project Toon Tanks Demo
description:
Project Toon Tanks Demo

Welcome to Project Toon Tanks Demo! Epic battle arenas where two players (or one player and an AI if you are ... taking a break from friends) fight to the death. Project Toon Tanks Demo is a small portion iof the full game. Full version contains the following and can be found on Steam:

Vehicles and Customization:
Chose a Tank from the roster of awesome war machines and customize them by painting your tanks with one of the over 50 different camouflage patterns available.

  • Abrams
  • Ariete
  • Armata
  • BMP
  • Bradley
  • Maus
  • Merkeva
  • M60 Patton
  • PL-01
  • Starship
  • Hetzer
  • Challenger
  • Leopard 1
  • Leopard 2
  • Leclerc
  • Type 59
  • E-100
  • T-90
  • T-95
  • IS-3
  • IS-4
  • T-29
  • KV-2
  • Strv 103B

Power Ups:
What make a battle intense? Unfair advantage my friend! There are several power ups scattered in destructible walls that will be revealed by shooting the walls. Capture these to get anything from a full repair to a close air support!

Diorama mode
Project Toon Tanks now has a Diorama mode!
